channel.title: No-ip Hosting? How is it actuallly done? No noobs please
channel.description:
;l Cant believe this but i cant figure what the fuck to do with all this no-ip crap. I'd appreciate the help. Ill tell you where im up to
[ul][li]1. I created an account[/li] [li]2. I created the .no-ip url[/li] [li]3. I downloaded the updater thing ;l[/li] [li]4. Now what? ;l[/li][/ul]
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2007, 11:24:23 AM[/size][hr]Ive added it to favourites as im not that likely to get a quick post on this..[br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2007, 11:28:19 AM[/size][hr]No posts still ;l

item.title: No-ip Hosting? How is it actuallly done? No noobs please
item.dc:creator: @Camz Camz
item.description:
@Camz wrote:

You need to log in with that domain as long as the rule is set and server is up.

Read full topic
item.source: No-ip Hosting? How is it actuallly done? No noobs please
